welcome.title: Welcome to Ralens
welcome.content: The Safe Network is a new, decentralised and secure way to access the world wide web. It is owned and controlled by everyone who uses it and is powered by the unused resources of its users.
welcome.description: Rediscover the magic of film photos through your smartphone.

cameraPermissionDialog.title: Camera permission
cameraPermissionDialog.content: Ralens needs access to your camera to take photos and videos.

microphonePermissionDialog.title: Microphone permission
microphonePermissionDialog.content: Ralens needs access to your microphone to record videos.

createEvent.endAtSupStartAtError: End date must be after start date
